name: 王怡惠
objective:
課程著重於彩瓷陶瓷專業人才的系統化培力，探討彩繪陶瓷的多元工藝表現，並深入其歷史脈絡與發展體系中加以分析，研究其繪製技法、工序流程、內容形態及美學樣貌的演變。透過理論探討與實作並重的教學模式，培育新世代工藝人才，致力於傳統技藝的保存與創新。
This course focuses on the structured training of skilled professionals in colored porcelain craftsmanship. It examines diverse artistic expressions of painted ceramics within their historical and developmental contexts, analyzing the evolution of painting techniques, processes, content forms, and aesthetic paradigms. By integrating theoretical discourse with hands-on practice, the course aims to cultivate a new generation of artisans committed to the preservation and innovation of this traditional craft.

remarks: 1. 本課程以實作為主，需移地於鶯歌場域進行集中授課教學，請衡量自我學習時間掌控，再行選課。2. 授課教師與業師共同授課，理論與實作同步以全英授課進行。3. 本課程融入鶯歌地方創生議題及大學社會責任 USR，以鶯歌特色陶瓷樣貌與歷史發展，做為課程背景知識。・This is a hands-on course mainly conducted in Yingge. Please evaluate your time management before enrolling.・Co-teaching by the instructor and Yingge craft master ensures both theory and practice are delivered in English.・The course incorporates local revitalization themes and University Social Responsibility (USR), using Yingge’s ceramic history and features as foundational knowledge.
